alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Orange and northwestern Osceola Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Hunters Creek, or near Buena Ventura Lakes, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Buena Ventura Lakes, East Lake Toho and Hunters Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
